attributes.action: push RBS and the other bailed-out banks into supporting socially useful investments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Government is effectively a major shareholder in RBS it should encourage those banks to make socially responsible investments and ones that are in the interest of the British public ( e.g. invest in ethical and sustainable projects and don't support Kraft takeover of Cadbury as it may put British jobs at risk).
